title: ‘How can a state block a highway… open it, regulate traffic’: Supreme Court to Haryana on Shambhu border blockade
selftext: The Haryana government had set up barricades at the Ambala-New Delhi national highway in February when Samyukta Kisan Morcha (SKM) (Non-Political) and Kisan Mazdoor Morcha (KMM) had announced to move towards Delhi in support of various demands
